title: 1 Church Street closes for Slide the City event
content:
Published 09/11 2015 02:29PM 
 
Updated 09/11 2015 02:29PM 
     
Copyright 2015 Nexstar Broadcasting, Inc. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed. 
    
HUNTSVILLE, Ala. (WZDX) 

Huntsville Police are reminding people of a downtown street closure because of the Slide the City event this weekend. 

Church Street will be closed between Clinton Avenue and Williams Avenue. 

The road will close on Saturday, September 12 at 5:00 a.m. and will reopen on Sunday at 8:00 p.m.
